name: RJRdata
tag_list: direct-marketing, data, mailing-list, telemarketing-list, email-marketing, database-marketing, catholic-list, catholic-marketing, fleet-operators-list
overview:
RJRdata, LLC is a multifaceted direct marketing service and data provider.

In addition to list management services they also offer a broad scope of products and services to enhance multi-channel marketing efforts. Through trust, confidence, communication, and overall dedication to customers, RJRdata works with each client and potential client to become an extension of their marketing arm.

More than just a data provider, list broker, or mailing list reseller, RJRdata, LLC truly is a multifaceted direct marketing service provider. Whether you need to cleanse and/or standardize your current database, need your email campaign fulfilled, would like help segmenting or profiling your clients, or would like to have your internal file managed and marketed to the list industry on your behalf, RJRdata is happy to assist you.
